Description.Name: Zhang Li
Description.Details: Zhang Li, callsign "Skylancer", was a genius level student who could have chosen to do anything. As it happens he chose to become a mechwarrior. His understanding of the battlefield and his almost encyclopaedic knowledge of mech tech allows him to play with the variables. weapon ranges, heat limits, manuverability he knows exactly when to push and when to back off. He is calculated fast and deadly. An asset in any lance.
